Network

Class Note

  • java.lang.Object
    • Network.Note
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Note
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A Note is an object with two fields: A string that holds a message that the server wishes to send to the client. A boolean which lets the client know if it is a chat message or a game message. A Note is the most common thing that a client will receive from the server.
    Author:
    Michael Hogue and Matt Latura
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Note(java.lang.String message)
      Default constructor with no arguments.
      Note(java.lang.String message, boolean isChatMessage)
      Construct a Note with a boolean so we can mark it as a chat message.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Note

        public Note(java.lang.String message)
        Default constructor with no arguments. A note with this constructor is defaulted to be not a chat message, as these Notes are sent more often.
        Parameters:
        message - The message that the server wishes to tell a specific client.

      • Note

        public Note(java.lang.String message,
    boolean isChatMessage)
        Construct a Note with a boolean so we can mark it as a chat message.
        Parameters:
        message - The message that the server wishes to tell a specific client.
        isChatMessage - If true, it will mark it as a chat message, and will go into the clients chat box. If false, it will mark it as a server message, and it will go into the clients server box.

    • Method Detail

      • getMessage

        public java.lang.String getMessage()
        Get the message associated with this Note that the Server needs to send.
        Returns:
        The String that the Note is attempting to send to the client.

      • setMessage

        public void setMessage(java.lang.String newMessage)
        Change the message associated with this Note.
        Parameters:
        newMessage - The new message that this Note will contain.

      • isChatMessage

        public boolean isChatMessage()
        Check to see if the Note is a chat message or a server message.
        Returns:
        If the Note is a chat message or a server message.

      • isChatMessage

        public void isChatMessage(boolean isChatMessage)
        Change the Note to either be a chat message or a server message depending on the boolean.
        Parameters:
        isChatMessage - The value to set if this is a chat message. If true, the Note is a chat message. If false, the Note is a server message.
